title: Indiabulls Housing Finance Q4 net up 11.23% to Rs 307 cr, FY22 net dips - Business Standard
content: Indiabulls Housing Finance Q4 net up 11.23% to Rs 307 cr, FY22 net dips  Business Standard
description: Income from operations fell to Rs 2,189 cr in Q4FY22 from Rs 2,372 cr in Q4FY21. Amount set aside for impairment on financial instruments declined to Rs 92 cr from Rs 316 cr
